content.text:
By unanimous consent, leave of absence was granted to:
  Mr. Upton (at the request of Mr. McCarthy) for November 2 through 
today on account of a family commitment.
  Ms. Clark of Massachusetts (at the request of Ms. Pelosi) for today.
  Mr. Hastings (at the request of Ms. Pelosi) for today and November 7.
  Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas (at the request of Ms. Pelosi) for 
today through November 9 on account of death in family.
  Ms. Roybal-Allard (at the request of Ms. Pelosi) for today.
content.speaker: Unknown
